title: Count Vowels
description:
Count Vowels

Given a string, count the number of vowels it contains. Vowels are defined as a, e, i, o, u (both uppercase and lowercase).

Examples:

  • Input: "hello"
    Output: 2
    Explanation: Contains 'e' and 'o'
  • Input: "PROGRAMMING"
    Output: 3
    Explanation: Contains 'O', 'A', and 'I'

Constraints:

  • Case-insensitive vowel counting
  • String can be empty
solution_text:
Count Vowels

Algorithm:

  1. Define vowel set
  2. Iterate through string
  3. Count characters that are vowels (case-insensitive)

Time Complexity: O(n) - iterate through string once

Space Complexity: O(1) - constant space
verify:
def verify(actual_output, expected_output):
    """Verify the count result"""
    passed = actual_output == expected_output
    return [passed, str(actual_output)]
